member.name: T:FM.WebSocketStatusCode
member.summary: An enumeration of potential WebSocket status codes.

member.name: F:FM.WebSocketStatusCode.Normal
member.summary: Indicates normal closure, meaning that the purpose for which the connection was established has been fulfilled.

member.name: F:FM.WebSocketStatusCode.GoingAway
member.summary: Indicates that an endpoint is "going away", such as a server going down or a browser having navigated away from a page.

member.name: F:FM.WebSocketStatusCode.ProtocolError
member.summary: Indicates that an endpoint is terminating the connection due to a protocol error.

member.name: F:FM.WebSocketStatusCode.InvalidType
member.summary: Indicates that an endpoint is terminating the connection because it has received a type of data that it cannot accept.

member.name: F:FM.WebSocketStatusCode.NoStatus
member.summary: Indicates that no status code was present in the Close frame. Reserved for use outside Close frames.

member.name: F:FM.WebSocketStatusCode.Abnormal
member.summary: Indicates that the connection was closed abnormally, without sending a Close frame. Reserved for use outside Close frames.

member.name: F:FM.WebSocketStatusCode.InvalidData
member.summary: Indicates that an endpoint is terminating the connection because it has received data within a message that was not consistent with the type of message.

member.name: F:FM.WebSocketStatusCode.PolicyViolation
member.summary: Indicates that an endpoint is terminating the connection because it has received a message that violates its policy.

member.name: F:FM.WebSocketStatusCode.MessageTooLarge
member.summary: Indicates that an endpoint is terminating the connection because it has received a message that is too big for it to process.

member.name: F:FM.WebSocketStatusCode.UnsupportedExtension
member.summary: Indicates that the client is terminating the connection because it has expected the server to negotiate one or more extensions, but the server didn't return them in the response message of the WebSocket handshake.

member.name: F:FM.WebSocketStatusCode.UnexpectedCondition
member.summary: Indicates that the server is terminating the connection because it encountered an unexpected condition that prevented it from fulfilling the request.

member.name: F:FM.WebSocketStatusCode.SecureHandshakeFailure
member.summary: Indicates that the connection was closed due to a failure to perform a TLS handshake. Reserved for use outside Close frames.
